harmonicRegression[source]

harmonicRegression(data, N)

Returns Fourier coefficients

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

derivative[source]

derivative(variable, N=20, dim='', order=1)

Calculates the first and second derivative in dimension of choice, applying a harmonic regression. See Benestad et al. (2006)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

calc_dX[source]

calc_dX(data, N, order)

Calculation of the derivative using harmonic regression (Fourier fit)

harmonicRegression[source]

harmonicRegression(data, N)

Returns Fourier coefficients

derivative[source]

derivative(variable, N=20, dim='', order=1)

Calculates the first and second derivative in dimension of choice, applying a harmonic regression. See Benestad et al. (2006)
